data.message: If it weren't for facebook I wouldn't have almost daily photo's of my Grandkids and Greatgrandkids or be able to keep in touch with so many of the people I love. Thank you for being part of my life!!

replies.message: We're happy to help you stay connected with loved ones, Jane. Thanks for being part of our community! -Rey

Facebook Ditto for me....I have the same benefits  from FACEBOOK as JANE concerning  family and  friends! !!
Thanks  FACEBOOK. .....I'M  so proud  to be on FACEBOOK  at the age of 77 yrs.old!!!😊💖
Facebook A friend blocked me because I talked to her girlfriend about her what do I do?
